Package vidis.util.graphs.graph.algorithm

Class Summary
AugmentNetworkFlow Class that provides a flow on a Network and maximizes it by augmentation paths using the algorithm of Edmonds and Karp.
BackTrackColoring Class for coloring a graph using a back tracking algorithm.
BreadthFirstGraphTraversal A concrete subclass of GraphTraversal that uses breadth-first search in traversing a graph.
Connectivity Class that computes the connectivity of a undirected graph.
DepthFirstGraphTraversal A concrete subclass of GraphTraversal that uses depth-first search in traversing a graph.
DepthFirstRecursiveGraphTraversal A concrete subclass of GraphTraversal that uses depth-first search in traversing a graph.
DepthFirstSimpleGraphTraversal A concrete subclass of GraphTraversal that uses depth-first search in traversing a graph.
FringeObject An Object encapsulated in a HeapNode, which in turn is added to the fringe.
GraphColoring Abstract class for an algorithm implementing the coloring of a graph.
GraphTraversal Abstract class for an algorithm implementing graph traversal.
GreedyColoring Class for coloring a graph using the greedy algorithm.
HeapNodeObjectComparator A Comparator for comparing the Vertex in the FringObject of the HeapNode against another Vertex.
MinSpanTreeKruskalAlgorithm Kruskal's algorithm for determining a minimum spanning tree of a graph.
NetworkFlow Abstract class for handling a flow on a Network.
ShortestPathAlgorithm Abstract class for implementing the shortest path algorithm.
ShortestPathAlgorithmDijkstra A concrete implementation of ShortestPathAlgorithm using Dijkstra's method.
ShortestPathAlgorithmMooreFord A concrete implementation of ShortestPathAlgorithm using the method of E.F.
TopologicalSorting A concrete subclass of GraphTraversal that performs a topological sort against a directed acyclic graph.
UnitCapacityNetworkFlow Class that provides a flow on a 0-1-Network, i.e. a network with each of its edges having a flow of either 0 or 1.
WarshallRoy An implementation of the transitive closure algorithm of S.A.
 

Exception Summary
NotEnoughColorsException Thrown when a GraphColoring class needs more colors than specified by the caller.
